text: Alexandru Cătălin Chiriță (born 24 June 1996) is a Romanian footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder. He played in Liga I for Petrolul Ploiești, CFR Cluj and Sepsi Sfântu Gheorghe. ==Personal life== His father, Daniel Chiriță, was also a football player. They played together at AFC Filipeștii de Pădure and CS Ștefănești. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Ploiești Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Liga I players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:CFR Cluj players Category:Sepsi OSK Sfântu Gheorghe players
title: Alexandru Chiriță
